**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 43 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 [Worm Prophet](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1651) **Source** [Night of the Gray Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=99) pg. 47 **Perception** +28 **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +32, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +32, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +36, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +32, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +34, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +32, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +32, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +34 **Str** +1 **Dex** +3 **Con** +0 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [chain shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6)_, silver veil, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ --- **AC** 42 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +30 **Will** +33 **HP** 335 **Anonymity** The Worm Prophet enforcer has a +2 circumstance bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) checks and saving throws to conceal their identity and a +2 circumstance bonus to their Deception DC against effects that ferret out information about the Gray Gardener's identity.
**Invaded** The worm prophet is subject to the [conqueror worm's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1642) Mental Invader effect.
**Gardener's Resolve** **Trigger** The Worm Prophet rolls a failure (but not a critical failure on a Will save against an effect with the [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) or [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) trait) **Requirements** The Worm Prophet features are obscured by a mask or hood; **Effect** The Gray Gardener assassin takes 3d8 mental damage, and the saving throw is a success. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _dagger_ +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+8 piercing **Ranged** _dagger_ +32 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+8 piercing **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Mending](/Spells.aspx?ID=189), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) - **2nd** [Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [Death Knell](/Spells.aspx?ID=63), [Enhance Victuals](/Spells.aspx?ID=101) - **3rd** [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173), [Neutralize Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), [Zone of Truth](/Spells.aspx?ID=379) - **4th** [Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34), [Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) - **5th** [Death Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), [Drop Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=92), [Mind Probe](/Spells.aspx?ID=193) - **6th** [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258), [Spellwrack](/Spells.aspx?ID=298), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) - **8th** [Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Spiritual Epidemic](/Spells.aspx?ID=304), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [Spiritual Guardian](/Spells.aspx?ID=305), [Warp Mind](/Spells.aspx?ID=369) - **9th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Divine Vessel](/Spells.aspx?ID=85), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×7), [Zealous Conviction](/Spells.aspx?ID=378) **Cleric Domain Spells** DC 40. 2 Focus Points - **9th** [Commanding Lash](/Spells.aspx?ID=408), [Touch of Obedience](/Spells.aspx?ID=459) **Capture Spirit** **Trigger** A target affected by one of the worm prophet's necromancy spells dies within 60 feet of the worm prophet; **Effect** The worm prophet harnesses a bit of the departing victim's soul, and the worm prophet is quickened 1 for 1 minute. They can use this extra action only to [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87), [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=88), or [Sustain a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=73). **Steady Spellcasting** If a reaction would disrupt the worm prophet's spellcasting action, the worm prophet attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
name: Worm Prophet
